summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Public Library; making appropriations from the Cumulative Reserve Fund for foundation/roof repairs, barrier-free access renovations at several libraries, and completion of a study of the downtown library expansion/replacement options; abandoning certain appropriations in the Cumulative Reserve Fund and re-appropriating a portion of those monies for support of the foundation/roof repair and barrier-free access projects.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
